title: micro-SaaS Tracker
description:
🚀 CEOs Micro-SaaS Tracker helps solopreneurs track and manage their Micro-SaaS journey from idea to exit. Stay focused, monitor key metrics, and streamline your workflow—no more lost momentum, just a clear roadmap to success. 

✅ Build ✅ Ship ✅ Scale ✅ Repeat ✅

Video Demo: youtube.com/watch?v=AdDxQUnN9x4
